EmailTemplate.name: Background Check Failed
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for applying to volunteer with Atlas Assistance Dogs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.First_Name__c} {!Account.Last_Name__c},
We want to thank you for your interest in volunteering with Atlas Assistance Dogs.
Unfortunately the results of your background check put us in a position that we cannot have you volunteering with Atlas.
We wish you nothing but the best.
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
